interactiveBlue.$description: Interactive Blue should only be used for hyperlinks, buttons, and other navigational elements. We ask that you avoid using it for anything elseâ€”no backgrounds, non-linked text, or decorative elements.

dandelionYellow.$description: Bright colors like Dandelion Yellow are great for drawing attention to key elements, but they work best when paired with neutral tones like Rochester Blue, Charcoal, or Medium Gray. Make sure any usage of yellow is accessible and easy to read.
